US conducts another round of strikes against Houthi targets in YemenThe United States conducted another round of strikes against Houthi targets in Yemen on Wednesday, U.S. officials told Reuters. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 00:40:33 GMT DCHPXC2RZ5KMDKC75OUT7WGBHU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-conducts-another-round-strikes-against-houthi-targets-yemen-2024-01-18/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali世界中东
Britain's cyber spies mark 80th anniversary of secret code-breaking computerBritain's GCHQ spy agency celebrated the 80th anniversary of Colossus on Thursday, putting the spotlight on a code-breaking computer which helped defeat Hitler's Germany and was so significant it was kept secret for decades. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 00:05:17 GMT 3MBKOLSXKVKQ3HDFDGKPJ7QBNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/britains-cyber-spies-mark-80th-anniversary-secret-code-writing-computer-2024-01-18/Reuters世界英国
China, Philippines seek better communication, management of conflicts in South China SeaChina and the Philippines agreed to improve maritime communication and to properly manage conflicts and differences through friendly talks in regards to issues around the South China Sea, according to a statement from the Chinese foreign ministry. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 23:54:58 GMT QNGCZNAWWROW7EW5NUURFWYSQY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-philippines-agree-improve-communication-manage-conflicts-south-china-sea-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russian military says Ukrainian drones downed over Moscow, Leningrad regionsRussia's Defence Ministry said early on Thursday that its air defence units had intercepted and destroyed one Ukrainian drone over Moscow region and a second over Leningrad region surrounding the country's second largest city, St Petersburg. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 23:43:46 GMT A7CK5JHJBZNNVDHRIPZOC3G4K4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-military-says-ukrainian-drones-downed-over-moscow-leningrad-regions-2024-01-17/Reuters世界欧洲
Biden-Kishida summit in Washington likely around April 10 -YomiuriJapan and the United States are working to reschedule a summit in Washington between Prime Minister Fumio Kishida and President Joe Biden around April 10, the Yomiuri newspaper reported on Thursday, citing diplomatic sources from both nations. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 23:22:31 GMT CD23YJCLCJNO3GOH52AH54F7FI https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-kishida-summit-washington-likely-around-april-10-yomiuri-2024-01-17/Reuters世界
Guatemalan ex-President Alejandro Giammattei barred from entry into USFormer Guatemalan President Alejandro Giammattei is barred from entering the U.S. over allegations of "his involvement in significant corruption," the State Department said on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 23:02:02 GMT 3UVQJINOCVMTPBTRJLIPSWSRJY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/guatemalan-ex-president-giammattei-barred-entry-into-us-state-dept-2024-01-17/Reuters世界美洲
Zelenskiy urges Ukrainians to seize initiative to determine war's outcomePresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy urged Ukraine and its people on Wednesday to seize the initiative to help determine the course of the 22-month-old war against Russia and secure world-wide support. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 22:57:44 GMT MBHUDJJBPVOZZKLYNLEI7YRTJE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-urges-ukrainians-seize-initiative-define-wars-outcome-2024-01-17/Reuters世界欧洲
US military says drone from Houthi-controlled areas struck US-owned vesselA drone launched from areas controlled by the Houthi rebels in Yemen struck a U.S.-owned vessel in the Gulf of Aden on Wednesday, the U.S. military said in a statement. UK's Cameron meets Iranian foreign minister, condemns attacks in ErbilBritish foreign secretary David Cameron met Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amir-Abdollahian on Wednesday at the World Economic Forum, UK's Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO) said in a statement. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 22:45:32 GMT YDUMBATKSVMFVLEKGODQS33KYY https://www.reuters.com/world/uks-cameron-meets-iranian-foreign-minister-condemns-attacks-erbil-2024-01-17/Reuters世界
Victory for UK's Sunak, but troubles remain for Rwanda asylum schemeBritish Prime Minister Rishi Sunak overcame a rebellion by his Conservative lawmakers on Wednesday to win a vote on his proposed law to send some asylum seekers to Rwanda, but he still faces many stumbling blocks for his flagship scheme. Abramovich ally says UK sanctions imposed due to 'pressure' on ministerA billionaire ally of Russian businessman Roman Abramovich renewed his bid to overturn British sanctions at the Court of Appeal on Wednesday, saying he was targeted because of pressure put on then Foreign Secretary Liz Truss by a Cabinet colleague.
